titleStmt.title: SII 7.761: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 761. (A.R. No. 137 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE PRAKARA OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . koṟccaṭaipaṉmar tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīcuntarapāṇṭiyatevarkku yāṇṭu 10vatu pattāvatu kaṟkaṭakanāyaṟṟu
Aparapakṣattu pañcamiyum tiṅkaḷkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa revatināḷ coḻakulavallinallūr Ūravarom vyavasthai paṇṇiṉapaṭi tiru
vayintirapurattu nāyaṉār teyvanāyakaṉ tiruvaṭikaḷile nammūril puttuḻār tiruvaraṅkaccelvarāṉa Uṭaiyār villavarāyar Eḻuntaruḷi
Iruntu namūr paṟṟil marutāṭu keraḷāntakanallūr kiḻkūṟum vārkālppaṭṭu pullāli tirucciṟṟampalanallūr cūriyaṉmeṭu Ivvūrkaḷil
nāyaṉār teyvanāyakaṉukkum nāyaṉār Eḻicainātapperumāḷukkum Iraṇṭāyiravaṉ maṭattukkum tiruviḷakkuppuṟamākavum tirumālaippuṟamā
kavum maṭappuṟamākavum tiruvayintirapurattu Ivar vaitta Akaram puttuḻāṉ brahmadeśattukku Akarappaṟṟākavum perumāḷ cuntarapāṇṭiyatevar perumāḷ
vikkiramapāṇṭiyatevar perumāḷ virapāṇṭiyatevar Eḻutiṉa tirumukappaṭi naṉcai puṉcai nilaṅkaḷum Ūrkkiḻ Iṟaiyiliyāka nam niyokappaṭi Eḻutiṉa
nilaṅkaḷum Inta pattāvatu Āṭimātavaraiyāka Aṉupavittuppotukukiṟa nilaṅkaḷ kaiOlaippaṭi nilaṅkaḷ Uṭaiyār villavarāyar nammil Oruttarāy
Ittaṉmaṅkaḷ ceytapaṭiyāle nāme cantirātittavaraiyāka naṭattik kuṭukkakkaṭavomākavum Ivar ceyta AInta taṉmaṅkaḷil tiruvayintirapurattut tā
ṉattār talakāriyam ceyvārkaḷātal virotampaṇṇiṉār Uṇṭākil nam Ūrāka Eḻuntiruntu tirttuk kuṭukkakkaṭavomākavum nam Ūril
Oruttar virotam paṇṇiṉārruṇṭākil Ivarkaḷ nammil Orutta rallavākakkaṭavatākavum Ippaṭi kallilum cempilum veṭṭikoḷ
vatākac coṉṉom coḻakulavalli Ūravarom vyavasthai kaṇṇamaṅkalattu muttuḻāṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉāṉa villavaṉ viḻupparaya ṉeḻuttu
Ivai neṭṭaipākkattup pāvālikiḻāṉ veḷāṉ tillaiṉāyakaṉāṉa tillaināyakamuventaveḷā ṉeḻuttu Ivai nittaviṉotappallavarayaṉ Eḻuttu
Ivai nittaviṉotamuventaveḷāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Eytaṉūr meykiḻāṉ veḷāṉ Oppilātāṉāṉa vecālippāṭi muventaveḷā ṉeḻuttu Ivai
tiruviḷakkaṉ teṉṉavaṉ viḻupparaya ṉeḻuttu Ivai Oḻukaṟaip paṉaippāṅkiḻāṉ veḷāṉ Āparaṇamiṭṭāṉāṉa Arintamaṉmuventaveḷā ṉeḻuttu
Ivai Erippākkamuṭaiyāṉ mīṉavaṉ muventaveḷāṉeḻuttu Ivai puttuḻāṉ Araiyaṉ maṇayāḻvā ṉeḻuttu Ivai Erippākkamuṭaiyāṉ kāṉakaṉāṭuuṭaiyāṉ
Eḻuttu Ivai keraḷarāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai tipattarayaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai caṅkirāmakecari muventaveḷā ṉeḻuttu Ivai maḻavarāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai kaṇṇāḻvā ṉeḻuttu
Ivai Aḻicupākkamuṭaiyāṉ vāṉavaṉ pallavaraiya ṉeḻuttu Ivai puṭaiyamuḻāṉ Araiyaṉ tevāṇṭā ṉeḻuttu Ivai Uḷcūṭṭu nalluḻāṉ tevaṉ
katirāyiramuṭaiyā ṉeḻuttu Ivai tiruviḷakkaṉ viḻiñattaraya ṉeḻuttu Ivai cīṉattaraya ṉeḻuttu Ivai tiruppeṟukiḻā ṉeḻuttu Ivai cikkaluṭaiyāṉ
kulatīpa muventaveḷaā ṉeḻuttu Ivai pullāliveḷāṉ vicayarāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai tiruniṟṟuccoḻa muventaveḷā ṉeḻuttu Ivai cūraippākkiḻavaṉ Arintavaṉ
viḻupparaya ṉeḻuttu Ivai Aḻicupākkamuṭaiyāṉ Araiyaṉ pecumperumāḷ Eḻuttu Ivai Intampeṭukiḻāṉ Araiyaṉ kecavappiḷḷai Eḻuttu Ivai pullāli
veḷāṉ muventaraya ṉeḻuttu .

app.note: The double pa is written here mostly as a group.
The double pa is written here mostly as a group.

div.p: Digital edition of SII 7.761 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
